items.title: Column Miter
items.materials: Woods and Painted Exterior Materials Only
standards: Finished left and right, by default.
Depth of case is 24 7/8” by default, FRONT is included in case depth.
CLM-100 for front, by default.
options: Available in Wood and Painted only.

items.title: Column
standards: Left and Right sides are not finished. (specify - FEs)
Choose front of Column. (see table)
options: FCB/FCT to finish bottom or top.
To finish back of column add a second Column front.

items.title: Rosette
items.description: Series 200 Column Cornerblock Options
standards: The height is equal to the width
Minimum width of 2”
7/8” thick

items.title: Flat
items.description: Series 200 Column Cornerblock Options
standards: The height is equal to the width
Minimum width of 2”
7/8” thick

items.title: Flat
items.description: Series 200 Column Molding Options
standards: Minimum width of 2”
7/8” thick

items.title: Channel
items.description: Series 200 Column Molding Options
standards: The channels are on 1/2” centers
The number of channels is in accordance to the width of the molding

items.title: Fluted
items.description: Series 200 Column Molding Options
standards: The channels are on 1/2” centers
The number of channels is in accordance to the width of the molding

items.title: Column 100
items.description: Column 100 Front- Miter (Woods and Painted Exterior Materials Only)
standards: Front will be either Veneer or Paint
Depth of case is 24 7/8” by default, FRONT is included in case depth
Available in 1/8” increments from 2” - 6” wide
restrictions: Only available in WOOD Veneers, Engineered or Painted

items.title: Column 101: Slab
items.description: Column 101 Front - Slab
standards: A flat molding applied to the front of a CLM cabinet
Depth of case is 24” by default, FRONT is additional to case depth
Flat molding is 7/8” thick for Alder, Cherry, Fir, Maple, White Oak and Black Walnut. Flat molding is 3/4” thick for Engineered Veneer, all M (Melamine), Textured Melamine, Gloss and Euro Materials.
Available in 1/8” increments from 2” - 6” wide

items.title: Column 201: Flat
items.description: Column 201 Front - Flat Cornerblock Top and Bottom, Flat Molding
standards: A solid Wood or Painted MDF cornerblock at top and bottom with a molding in between
Depth of case is 24” by default, FRONT is additional to case depth
Available in 1/8” increments from 2” - 6” wide
restrictions: Not available in Engineered, Melamine, Gloss and Euro Materials

restrictions: Not available in Engineered, Melamine, Gloss and Euro Materials

items.title: Column 301: Wainscot
items.description: Column 301 Front - Wainscot Molding
standards: Wainscot design is on the front
Front face is made from 4 pieces of material with horizontal grain across the top and bottom rails, and vertical grain on the styles

Available in 1/8” increments from 2” - 6” wide
restrictions: Not available in Engineered, Melamine, Gloss and Euro Materials
